identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Clinical Zen' aesthetic that blends Swiss precision with organic warmth, avoiding generic SaaS tropes.

theme.description: A sterile but human environment. High contrast for data legibility, warm greys for backgrounds to reduce eye strain, and deep surgical indigo for branding.

typography.instructions: Use Manrope for all Headings (h1-h6) with tight tracking. Use Inter for all body text, inputs, and dense data tables.

primary.description: Surgical Indigo - Use for primary buttons, active states, and key headings.

secondary.description: Clinical Grey - Use for sidebar backgrounds, card headers, and secondary buttons.

background.description: Pure White for card surfaces, very light cool grey for app background.

accent.description: Success Mint - Use for 'Approved', 'Completed', or positive metrics.

destructive.description: Alert Vermilion - Use for 'Critical', 'Delete', or high-risk patient tags.

dashboard.rules: High density. Widgets must stretch to fill height (h-full). No jagged bottoms.

wizard.rules: Remove sidebars. Focus solely on the input flow.

case_room.rules: Tabs on top, content area fills remaining height. Use 'Glass' headers for the tab bar.

custom_instructions: Buttons: Use sharp or slightly rounded corners (rounded-sm). Avoid pill shapes unless for status tags.
Cards: Flat, white background, 1px border. Minimal shadow.
Inputs: High height (h-10 or h-12). Pale grey background (bg-slate-50) on focus white.
Tables: Clean, minimal borders. Zebra striping is optional but prefer hover-row highlighting.

assets_instructions.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'Stethoscope', 'Activity', 'FileText', 'Users', 'Calendar' as primary icons.
assets_instructions.logo: Use a simple typographic logo with the 'Activity' icon in the primary color.

universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers only.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container. This disrupts the human natural reading flow.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors separate good from extraordinary.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a data-testid attribute.
